Title: Breast in Show
Plot:
After meeting Irma for a date, Alan finds himself defending her when she is charged with a sex crime by protesting topless.

Meanwhile, Denise finds it difficult to remain close to Daniel when he invites her to his own funeral, and Garrett faces his toughest challenge yet when Catherine invades his office.
GuestStars: Alex Nevil,  Ted Lyde,  Marc Vann,  Thom Gossom Jr.,  Scott MacDonald,  Ana Ortiz,  Erica Gimpel,  Lisa Vidal,  Daniel Kash,  Joleen Lutz,  Kurt Scholler,  Michael J. Fox
